parse.title: List of health and medical strikes

text.*:
The following is a list of health and medical strikes:

Contents

  • 1 20th century
  • 2 21st century
    • 2.1 2003
    • 2.2 2006
    • 2.3 2009
    • 2.4 2010
    • 2.5 2012
    • 2.6 2013
    • 2.7 2014
    • 2.8 2015
    • 2.9 2016
  • 3 References

20th century[edit]

  • Saskatchewan doctors' strike – 1962
  • Belgium physicians' and dentists' strike in 1964, April 1 to April 18, 1964
  • Quebec specialist doctors strike[1] - 08/10/1970
  • UK consultants' strike – January to April 1975[2]
  • UK junior doctors' strike – November 1975[2]
  • Alberta Nurses Strike – 1982[3]
  • Israel – 1983[4]
  • Australian nurses 50-day strike[5] - 1986
  • Manitoba Nurses Strike – 1991
  • Sweden – Doctors strike 1994[6]

21st century[edit]

2003[edit]

  • Scottish Nursery Nurses Strike – 2003-2004

2006[edit]

  • Germany – Doctors' strike March 2006
  • New Zealand – 15–20 June 2006[7]

2009[edit]

  • Switzerland – Vaud and Geneva cantons – March 2009[8]

2010[edit]

  • Sudanese Doctors' Strike – March 2010

2012[edit]

  • Germany – Doctors' strike March 2012[9]
  • India – nationwide strike June 2012[10]

2013[edit]

  • UK Save our A&E (Lewisham)[11] – January 2013
  • Jamaica Junior Medical Doctors[12] April 2013

2014[edit]

  • UK NHS Pay Strike[13] – September 2014

2015[edit]

  • UK Midwives Strike[14] – January 2015
  • Northern Ireland Midwives Strike[15] – April 2015
  • Brazil - Resident doctors strike – September and December 2015[16]
  • England – Junior Doctors' Strikes[17] – November 2015
  • France – Doctors' strike[18] – 18 November 2015
  • UK NHS Student Protest[19] – December 2015

2016[edit]

  • UK NHS Student Protest[20] – January 2016
  • England Junior Doctors' Strikes – January to April 2016[21]
  • Peru doctors' strike – 17 February 2016[22]
  • England Junior Doctors' Strikes – March 2016
  • Kenya doctors strike December 5, 2016[23]
  • Sudan Doctors strike October and November[24]

References[edit]

  2. ^ a b reporter, Neil Bowdler Health. "1975: What happened when doctors last went on strike?". BBC News. Retrieved 2016-04-19. 
  3. ^ Stabler, C.; Schnurr, L.; Powell, G.; Stewart, B.; Guenter, C. A. (1 August 1984). "Impact of a province-wide nurses' strike on medical care in a regional referral centre". CMAJ. 131 (3): 205–210. PMID 6744165 – via www.cmaj.ca. 
  4. ^ Sachdev, P S (1986-03-01). "Ethical issues of a doctors' strike". Journal of Medical Ethics. 12 (1): 53. doi:10.1136/jme.12.1.53. ISSN 0306-6800. PMC 1375310 . PMID 3959044. 
  5. ^ Cregan, Australian Women's Archives Project, Christina. "A 'Blueprint' for Union Organising: Multiplying the membership in the Australian Nursing Federation (Victorian Branch) 1989-2012 - The 1986 50-Day Strike". www.womenaustralia.info. 
  6. ^ Dolley, Margaret (1994-03-26). "Swedish doctors extend series of strikes". BMJ. 308 (6932): 808. doi:10.1136/bmj.308.6932.808a. ISSN 0959-8138. 
  7. ^ Robinson, Geoffrey; McCann, Kieran; Freeman, Peter; Beasley, Richard (2008-06-01). "The New Zealand national junior doctors' strike: implications for the provision of acute hospital medical services". Clinical Medicine. 8 (3): 272–275. doi:10.7861/clinmedicine.8-3-272. ISSN 1470-2118. PMID 18624033. 
  8. ^ "Doctors strike over hard-to-swallow reform - SWI swissinfo.ch". SWI swissinfo.ch. Retrieved 2016-04-19. 
  9. ^ "Ärztestreik: "Das ist ein Sklavenaufstand"". www.handelsblatt.com. Retrieved 2016-04-19. 
  10. ^ "BMJ Careers – Is it ethical for doctors to strike?". careers.bmj.com. Retrieved 2016-04-19. 
  11. ^ "25,000 protesters march over 'crazy' Lewisham Hospital A&E plans". 
  12. ^ [1][dead link]
  13. ^ Association, Press (18 September 2014). "NHS workers back strike action in pay row by 2-to-1 margin". The Guardian. 
  14. ^ "Nurse and midwife strike action suspended after new pay offer". 
  15. ^ "Midwives stage strike action". 30 April 2015 – via www.bbc.co.uk. 
  16. ^ "Médicos residentes iniciam greve no país, por tempo indeterminado". 8 December 2015. 
  17. ^ Elgot, Jessica; Campbell, Denis (17 October 2015). "Thousands rally in London to protest junior doctor contract - as it happened" – via www.theguardian.com. 
  18. ^ lefigaro.fr. "Grève générale des médecins ce vendredi contre la loi santé de Touraine". Le Figaro. Retrieved 2016-04-19. 
  19. ^ Tiplady, Danielle; Humm, Charlotte (15 December 2015). "For us student nurses, bursaries are a lifeline. We will fight against their cuts". The Guardian. 
  20. ^ Grierson, Jamie (9 January 2016). "Student nurses and midwives protest over NHS bursary plans". The Guardian. 
  21. ^ "Dispute Timeline". British Medical Association. 
  22. ^ "Médicos acatan paro de 24 horas para exigir aumento de sueldo". El Comercio. Retrieved 2016-04-19. 
  23. ^ "Kenyan doctors' union officials jailed over strike". African Media Agency. 2017-02-13. Retrieved 2017-02-14. 
  24. ^ "Sudanese security arrests doctors union chief". Sudan Tribune. Retrieved 2018-02-18.
